title: Mexican Patrol Clashes With Gunmen Protecting Son of El Chapo
text:
MEXICO CITY—Violence erupted in the Mexican city of Culiacán on Thursday after security forces clashed with a group of gunmen protecting the son of the former cartel kingpin Joaquín “El Chapo” Guzmán, sparking a wave of attacks across the city that terrorized residents.

Late Thursday night, it wasn’t clear whether Ovidio Guzmán, one of the jailed drug lord’s sons, was in government custody. The elder Mr. Guzman’s sons are believed to have taken over at least partial control of the cartel following their father’s extradition...
description: Violence erupted in a northern Mexican city after security forces clashed with a group of gunmen protecting a son of the former cartel kingpin Joaquín “El Chapo” Guzmán, sparking a wave of attacks that terrorized residents.
